law.catch_line: A person who violates § 16-201(a)(6) or (7) or § 16-903 of this title without knowing that the act...
law.text: A person who violates § 16-201(a)(6) or (7) or § 16-903 of this title without knowing that the act is illegal shall pay a civil penalty and have the matter adjudicated in accordance with § 13-604 of this article.
